thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bone Therapeutics Announces Private Placement Of Convertible Bonds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bone Therapeutics Announces Private Placement Of Convertible Bonds
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - BONE THERAPEUTICS:
* REG-BONE THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF CONVERTIBLE BONDS
* ‍BOOK BUILDING PROCESS COMMENCED YESTERDAY, 6 MARCH 2018, AFTER MARKET CLOSE​
* ‍RESULTS OF OFFERING WILL BE ANNOUNCED AS SOON AS POSSIBLE AFTER CLOSING OF BOOK BUILDING​
* ‍TRADING SHARES ON EURONEXT BRUSSELS AND EURONEXT PARIS WILL BE SUSPENDED DURING BOOK BUILDING PERIOD​
* ‍TRADING IN STOCK IS EXPECTED TO RESUME FOLLOWING PUBLICATION OF RESULTS OF OFFERING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
